tic0012.loselessoundrecord.classes

Class UncompressedAudioRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • tic0012.loselessoundrecord.classes.UncompressedAudioRecorder

  • public class UncompressedAudioRecorder
extends java.lang.Object
    Uncompressed Mono 16bit recorder Sample rate = 44 100 kHz
    Author:
    tic0012, Michal Tichý

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private int AUDIO_SOURCE
      the recording source
      private int bufferSize
      Total size (in bytes) of the buffer where audio data is written to during the recording.
      private int CHANNEL_COUNT
      Number of channel 1 = mono, 2 = stereo
      private boolean isRecording
      Recording state
      private AudioRecord recorder
      The AudioRecord class manages the audio resources
      private int RECORDER_AUDIO_ENCODING
      Format in which the audio data is represented
      private int RECORDER_BIT_PER_SAMPLE
      Number of bits per Sample
      private int RECORDER_CHANNELS
      Describes the configuration of the audio channels
      private int RECORDER_SAMPLE_RATE
      Sample Rate in Hz the sample rate expressed in Hertz. 44100Hz is currently the only rate that is guaranteed to work on all devices
      private java.lang.String saveFolder
      Folder where to save files
